page.description: The CTODT() function converts a date and time string to a Date Time value (date + time).

argument.name: character
argument.description: A character string containing a legitimate representation of a date time value.

section.description: As of Version 10.5, if the 'am' or 'pm' flag is left out, Alpha Anywhere now assumes that the user is specifying a time using a 24 hour format. Previously, a time value of '00:00:00' was considered to be invalid. Now this is a valid 24 hour format time value.
